title: Disconnected From PVP.NET constantly
body:
So I've been having a problem since the first patch for season 5 came out to where when I log on it'll automatically have me disconnected from pvp.net and make me click reconnect. Sometimes when I click reconnect it will fix it then but I have problem where it can take upto five times for it to work. Then when I get in pregame in the chat it'll say "Disconnected from PVP.NET it will automatically reconnect when possible" and then it'll say "Reconnected To PVP.NET" before shortly disconnecting again. Please help; I've tried repairing and I've forwarded the ports to LoL.

[Both pictures (PNG so wouldn't let me attach)](http://imgur.com/Wzh3QxA,b8vVsYj)

replies.body:
Hey everyone,

We commonly see this issue when there isn't a stable connection to our PvP.net Servers.  When you open up the client, your computer and our servers constantly play a game of catch.  Your computer pings our servers, our servers receive it and ping back, and so on and so forth.  If your computer pings our servers, and never hears back, it will give you these disconnected errors.  

In order to try to resolve these issues, make sure that you complete the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  There are a lot of steps, but they usually resolve this issue.

After completing the steps and it still leaves a red notification on your client causing you only to see red as well, don't give up on resolving this just yet!  Make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our Tech Specialists.  They can work with you further to get this resolved ASAP.  Make sure to include the following in your ticket though:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
Out of curiosity, then, why is is this a brand new issue for me since the last patch? None of my computer settings have changed at all.

1. go to desktop
2. press windows button + r
3. copy and paste "services.msc"
4. click browse and look for "ip helper" in that list
5. stop and disable the ip helper and then relog.
